question:
you recently attended a meeting at a hotel. When you returned home, you found you had left some important papers at the hotel. 


write a letter to the manager of the hotel. in your letter 
 1- Say where you think left the papers 
2- explain why they are so important
3- tell the manager what you want him to do
text: This letter concerns missing highly important annals during the meeting held in your hotel last Thursday with my company. actually, when I reached my house I noticed these documents have been lost in that event.

Most probably if you check the table of meeting room number five on the first floor, it could be three, Also I will be appreciated if you did not find them at that place you may find them in the restaurant on the same level because after our meeting we had our lunch.
Those documents are very important and confidential, in addition, it contains a piece of important information about our company.
In the end, I will be grateful if you help me to return these documents, Just keep them in your office and give me a call, I will come and collect them as soon as I could.
